name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Bendy and the Ink Machine Wallpaper

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Bendy and the Ink Machine Wallpaper turn new tab to Bendy and the Ink Machine background. Theme for Bendy and the Ink Machine fans.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Extension Features:

1. Each new tab displays a shuffled Bendy and the Ink Machine wallpaper.
2. Customize your Bendy and the Ink Machine background or select favorites in the wallpaper panel.
3. Integrated Google Search bar.
4. Direct links to email and social media platforms.
5. Automatically displays the current date and time.
6. Create notes to keep track of your tasks.
7. Quick links to your frequently visited websites.
8. Simplified access to your bookmarks.
9. Add websites to the Shortcut panel for faster navigation.
10. Immediate access to Google applications.
11. Explore more themes easily.
12. Share content directly to social media.
13. Download wallpapers quickly.
14. One-click access to gaming.
15. Activate dynamic animations like snow, rain, falling leaves, and fireworks on your Bendy and the Ink Machine new tab.
